tool_description: TMAlign is a computational tool used for structural alignment of two protein structures. It calculates the TM-score to evaluate the structural similarity between the aligned proteins.

required_parameters.name: aln_pdb_path
required_parameters.description: Path to the PDB file of the protein structure to be aligned.

required_parameters.name: ref_pdb_path
required_parameters.description: Path to the PDB file of the reference protein structure.

return_values.name: tmalign_output
return_values.description: Execution output containing detailed alignment information.

return_values.name: tmscore
return_values.description: The TM-score value representing the structural similarity between the aligned proteins.
